greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(n, psi(n)).
comment: Here psi(n) is Dedekind's psi function A001615.
a(n) = 1 iff either n=2 or n is in A255602. - _Robert Israel_, Mar 12 2019
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: f:= proc(n) local p; igcd(n, n*mul(1+1/p, p=numtheory:-factorset(n))) end proc:
program: (PARI) dpsi(n) = n * sumdivmult(n, d, issquarefree(d)/d); \\ A001615
results.author: _Torlach Rush_, Mar 05 2019
